content: **knitted mushroom/christmas decoration in alpaca with garter stitch or stocking stitch and french knots work from bottom up theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern z-982 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** 1 mushroom measures approx width at top = 7 cm length = 7-9 cm **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 100 off white 50 g colour 607 light brown 50 g colour 618 nougat 50 g colour 2020 light nougat 50 g colour 3620 red 50 g colour 7238 green grass 50 g colour 7815 forest 50 g colour 9025 hazelnut 50 g colour 9029 wheat field a mushroom weighs approx 6 g without filling **accessories** some cotton wool for filling **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 26 stitches in width and 34 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
